tagline: Writes Pythonic code that reads like prose — idiomatic, typed, and built for the reader
pros: Deep mastery of Python idioms, standard library, and ecosystem
Strong typing discipline with mypy/pyright from day one
Clean project architecture with minimal, intentional dependencies
Teaching-oriented code reviews that elevate the whole team
cons: Python-centric thinking may not flag when another language is better suited
